attributes.comment:
There are so many families that have had paperwork in to fulfill the dream of
adding a child to their family or finally becoming a family. Foreign adoptions
dramatically cut the risk of a birth parent coming back for their child. I even
looked into adoption in the U.S. only to find that the wait is longer than what we
are currently experiencing and if we went to a private adoption agency, it would be
just as or more expensive than many foreign adoptions with the fear of a birth
parent changing their mind at any time. Increasing fees would hurt many people
that have budgeted for their adoption. I urge you not to raise fees especially when
we have to pay for updates which correlate to wait time. Please remember that
there are so many children needing and wanting homes all over the world and that
you can help or hinder that process. I pray you help by not raising fees.

Respectfully,
Mrs. Tiffany Soignoli

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Tiffany L. Soignoli
